text.section:
A covered electronic device manufacturer's registration shall include:
The brand names under which the manufacturer sells or offers for sale covered electronic devices in the State;
Whether the manufacturer has implemented a covered electronic device takeback program;
If the manufacturer has implemented a covered electronic device takeback program:
A toll-free number or website address that provides information about the takeback program, including a detailed description of how a person may return a covered electronic device for recycling, refurbishing, or reuse; and
One year after the implementation of the program and each year thereafter, a report on the implementation of the program during the prior year, including:
The total number of covered electronic devices sold in the State in the prior year, including:
The types of covered electronic devices sold; and
The brand names under which the covered electronic devices were sold; and
Any additional information required by the Department in regulation.

The registration shall:
Be submitted to the Department by March 1 of each year; and
If the manufacturer has implemented a covered electronic device takeback program, be updated prior to any significant change in the program.

section.section: The covered electronic device manufacturer registration fee shall be paid by a manufacturer in accordance with this subsection.

For the initial registration by a manufacturer, the registration fee is:
$10,000 for a manufacturer that sold at least 1,000 covered electronic devices in the State in the prior year; and
$5,000 for a manufacturer that sold at least 100 but not more than 999 covered electronic devices in the State in the prior year.

For each subsequent annual registration by a manufacturer that did not have an implemented covered electronic device takeback program in the prior year, the registration fee is:
$5,000 for a manufacturer that sold at least 100 but not more than 999 covered electronic devices in the State in the prior year.
For each subsequent annual registration by a manufacturer that had an implemented covered electronic device takeback program in the prior year, the registration fee is $500.
There is no registration fee for a manufacturer that sold less than 100 covered electronic devices in the State in the prior year.

The registration fee required under this subsection shall:
Be submitted to the Department by March 1 of each year; and
Be paid into the State Recycling Trust Fund.

The Department shall:
Review the registration submitted under this section; and
If the registration does not meet the requirements of this section and the regulations adopted by the Department under this subtitle, notify the manufacturer of the insufficiency.
Within 60 days after receipt of a notice of insufficiency, the manufacturer shall submit a revised registration that addresses the insufficiencies noted by the Department.

text.section: The Department shall maintain a list of registered covered electronic device manufacturers on its Web site.
The sales data submitted in accordance with subsection (a)(4) of this section shall be treated as confidential and proprietary, and may not be disclosed except as otherwise required by law.
